category: news
title: "Debate: The E.U. Was a Mistake"
excerpt: "Yet the E.U.'s existence is infinitely preferable to its absence. It is a prime example of the \"nirvana fallacy\" to compare the E.U. and its flaws to a libertarian ideal of free trade and unregulated markets. The relevant comparison is between the E.U. and the politically plausible alternatives."
